verses.verse: וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> kept יֹאשִׁיָּ֧הוּ <S%H2977><s%> Moreover Josiah בִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem פֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> a passover לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁחֲט֣וּ <S%H7819><s%> and they killed הַפֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7223><s%> [day] of the first

וַיַּעֲמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> And he set הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in מִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4931><s%> in their charges וַֽיְחַזְּקֵ֔ם <S%H2388><s%> and encouraged לַעֲבוֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> them to the service בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said לַ֠לְוִיִּם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites [הַמְּבוּנִים כ] (הַמְּבִינִ֨ים <S%H995><s%> attend ק) לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> all Israel הַקְּדוֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> which were holy לַיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD תְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> Put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרוֹן־ <S%H727><s%> ark הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> the holy בַּ֠בַּיִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֜ה <S%H1129><s%> did build שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <S%H8010><s%> which Solomon בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> no לָכֶ֥ם מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> [it shall] not [be] a burden בַּכָּתֵ֑ף <S%H3802><s%> upon [your] shoulders עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now עִבְדוּ֙ <S%H5647><s%> serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> now the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

[וְהִכֹּונוּ כ] (וְהָכִ֥ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> certain ק) לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> [yourselves] by the houses אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers כְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4256><s%> after your courses בִּכְתָ֗ב <S%H3791><s%> according to the writing דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבְמִכְתַּ֖ב <S%H4385><s%> and according to the writing שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וְעִמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> And stand in בַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy לִפְלֻגּוֹת֙ <S%H6391><s%> [place] according to the divisions בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the families הָֽאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לַאֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> of your brethren בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the lay הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> people וַחֲלֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2515><s%> and [after] the division בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> household אָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> of a father's לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites

וְשַׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> So kill הַפָּ֑סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover וְהִתְקַדְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctify וְהָכִ֣ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> yourselves and prepare לַאֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> your brethren לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that [they] may do כִּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses פ

וַיָּ֣רֶם <S%H7311><s%> gave יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> And Josiah לִבְנֵ֪י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted הָעָ֟ם <S%H5971><s%> folk צֹ֞אן <S%H6629><s%> of the flock כְּבָשִׂ֣ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs וּבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted עִזִּים֮ <S%H5795><s%> goat הַכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner לַפְּסָחִים֒ <S%H6453><s%> all for the passover offerings לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> that הַנִּמְצָ֗א <S%H4672><s%> for all that were present לְמִסְפַּר֙ <S%H4557><s%> to the number שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> of thirty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּבָקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bullocks שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> and three אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מֵרְכ֥וּשׁ <S%H7399><s%> substance הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> these [were] of the king's ס

וְשָׂרָ֞יו <S%H8269><s%> And his princes לִנְדָבָ֥ה <S%H5071><s%> willingly לָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people לַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <S%H3548><s%> to the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> and to the Levites הֵרִ֑ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> gave חִלְקִיָּ֨ה <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah וּזְכַרְיָ֜הוּ <S%H2148><s%> and Zechariah וִֽיחִיאֵ֗ל <S%H3171><s%> and Jehiel נְגִידֵי֙ <S%H5057><s%> rulers בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לַכֹּהֲנִ֞ים <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests נָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> gave לַפְּסָחִ֗ים <S%H6453><s%> for the passover offerings אַלְפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H505><s%> two thousand וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וּבָקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [small cattle] and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

[וְכָונַנְיָהוּ כ] (וְ֠כָֽנַנְיָהוּ <S%H3562><s%> Conaniah ק) וּשְׁמַֽעְיָ֨הוּ <S%H8098><s%> also and Shemaiah וּנְתַנְאֵ֜ל <S%H5417><s%> and Nethaneel אֶחָ֗יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וַחֲשַׁבְיָ֧הוּ <S%H2811><s%> and Hashabiah וִיעִיאֵ֛ל <S%H3273><s%> and Jeiel וְיוֹזָבָ֖ד <S%H3107><s%> and Jozabad שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> chief הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites הֵרִ֨ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> gave לַלְוִיִּ֤ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites לַפְּסָחִים֙ <S%H6453><s%> for passover offerings חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> five אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּבָקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [small cattle] and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וַתִּכּ֖וֹן <S%H3559><s%> was prepared הָעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <S%H5656><s%> So the service וַיַּֽעַמְד֨וּ <S%H5975><s%> stood הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עָמְדָ֛ם <S%H5975><s%> stood וְהַלְוִיִּ֥ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מַחְלְקוֹתָ֖ם <S%H4256><s%> in their courses כְּמִצְוַ֥ת <S%H4687><s%> commandment הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> according to the king's

וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> And they killed הַפָּ֑סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover וַיִּזְרְק֤וּ <S%H2236><s%> sprinkled הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests מִיָּדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> [the blood] from their hands וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites מַפְשִׁיטִֽים׃ <S%H6584><s%> flayed

וַיָּסִ֨ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> And they removed הָעֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offerings לְ֠תִתָּם <S%H5414><s%> that they might give לְמִפְלַגּ֤וֹת <S%H4653><s%> according to the divisions לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> households אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers' לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the lay הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> people לְהַקְרִיב֙ <S%H7126><s%> to offer לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כַּכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> as [it is] written בְּסֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses וְכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> this לַבָּקָֽר׃ <S%H1241><s%> And so [did they] with the oxen

וַֽיְבַשְּׁל֥וּ <S%H1310><s%> And they roasted הַפֶּ֛סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> according to the ordinance וְהַקֳּדָשִׁ֣ים <S%H6944><s%> but the [other] holy בִּשְּׁל֗וּ <S%H1310><s%> [offerings] sod בַּסִּיר֤וֹת <S%H5518><s%> they in pots וּבַדְּוָדִים֙ <S%H1731><s%> and in caldrons וּבַצֵּ֣לָח֔וֹת <S%H6745><s%> and in pans וַיָּרִ֖יצוּ <S%H7323><s%> and divided [them] speedily לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the lay הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> people

וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> And afterward הֵכִ֤ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> they made ready לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> and for וְלַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> for themselves and for the priests כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> because the priests בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron בְּהַֽעֲל֛וֹת <S%H5927><s%> [were busied] in offering הָעוֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offerings וְהַחֲלָבִ֖ים <S%H2459><s%> and the fat עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> until night וְהַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> therefore the Levites הֵכִ֣ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> prepared לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> and for וְלַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> for themselves and for the priests בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> of Aaron

וְהַמְשֹֽׁרֲרִ֨ים <S%H7891><s%> And the singers בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons אָסָ֜ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מַעֲמָדָ֗ם <S%H4612><s%> [were] in their place כְּמִצְוַ֤ת <S%H4687><s%> according to the commandment דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David וְאָסָ֞ף <S%H623><s%> and Asaph וְהֵימָ֤ן <S%H1968><s%> and Heman וִֽידֻתוּן֙ <S%H3038><s%> and Jeduthun חוֹזֵ֣ה <S%H2374><s%> seer הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִ֖ים <S%H7778><s%> and the porters לְשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> [waited] at every gate וָשָׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> have לָהֶ֗ם לָסוּר֙ <S%H5493><s%> they might not depart מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from עֲבֹֽדָתָ֔ם <S%H5656><s%> from their service כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אֲחֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> for their brethren הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites הֵכִ֥ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> prepared לָהֶֽם׃

וַ֠תִּכּוֹן <S%H3559><s%> was prepared כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבוֹדַ֨ת <S%H5656><s%> So all the service יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to keep הַפֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover וְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> and to offer עֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּמִצְוַ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> according to the commandment הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king יֹאשִׁיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H2977><s%> Josiah

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> kept בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַֽנִּמְצְאִ֛ים <S%H4672><s%> that were present אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> and the feast הַמַּצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נַעֲשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> to that kept פֶ֤סַח <S%H6453><s%> And there was no passover כָּמֹ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3644><s%> like בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel מִימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> from the days שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> of Samuel הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> had any מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> all the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor עָשׂ֡וּ <S%H6213><s%> neither did כַּפֶּ֣סַח <S%H6453><s%> such a passover אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> keep יֹֽ֠אשִׁיָּהוּ <S%H2977><s%> as Josiah וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֤ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> and all Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel הַנִּמְצָ֔א <S%H4672><s%> that were present וְיוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ס

בִּשְׁמוֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְמַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the reign יֹאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> kept הַפֶּ֥סַח <S%H6453><s%> was this passover הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this
